body:
Hi Rob,


Actually, you want your rectangles to be the four sides plus another
one _below_ the coffer, sealing it off from the world, so to speak.
The idea is that the mkillum replaces these surfaces with illum light
sources (imposters), whose output distributions mimics the
coffer/ceiling combination.  You need to make sure that source rays
can't sneak past this geometry, which is why you want it to make a
tight seal around your luminaire system.

-G
